LinkInFocus: Regain your focus on professional networking sites

In today's digital world, where distractions and data concerns abound, LinkInFocus solves for professionals who value meaningful connections and digital safety. Experience a distraction-reduced professional networking session, all while being assured of your privacy.


Features:

Hide the Noise: Conceals the feed, news, and advertisements on LinkedIn, creating a distraction-free environment to boost your productivity


Benefits:

1. Enhanced Productivity: Dive deep into meaningful professional connections without the noise

2. Reduced Digital Fatigue: Our gentle overlay ensures prolonged browsing without eye strain

3. Streamlined User Experience: Enjoy a refined professional feed view without data concerns

4. Complete Privacy: Sleep easy knowing that LinkInFocus respects your privacy. No data collection. Just pure functionality

Join the community of professionals prioritizing focus and privacy. Install LinkInFocus today and revolutionise your networking experience.


Coming Soon:

Tinted Overlay: Introduces a calming shade over your LinkedIn feed, spotlighting the content and connections that truly matter

Toggle On/Off: One-click activation or deactivation, giving you complete control over your browsing ambiance

Lightweight & Efficient: No slowdowns, no interruptions. Just a seamless browsing experience

Privacy-Centric Design: Your data is yours. We donâ€™t collect, store, or share your browsing activities or personal data

"LinkInFocus" does not collect, store, or share any personal or browsing data of its users. The sole purpose of this extension is to enhance the user's browsing experience by providing a tinted overlay. Use of this extension is at the user's own risk.
